description: 9th grade gifted student (140 IQ equivalent) who quickly masters grade-level content and needs advanced challenges

challenge.rule: Flag tasks that are too easy or lack appropriate cognitive demand for gifted learners

severity_thresholds.high: All tasks at grade level with no above-level options; gifted student will master in minutes
severity_thresholds.medium: Some advanced tasks offered but still capped at grade level+1; insufficient challenge
severity_thresholds.low: Advanced options exist but not sufficiently challenging for 3+ year gap students

pacing.rule: Flag rigid pacing that forces gifted students to wait or repeat content already mastered

severity_thresholds.high: Lock-step instruction where everyone moves together; gifted students waiting 80%+ of class time
severity_thresholds.medium: Some flexibility but gifted students still waiting frequently; limited pre-assessment
severity_thresholds.low: Flexibility exists but not for content acceleration or curriculum compacting

abstract.rule: Flag lessons that are exclusively concrete/practical without theoretical or abstract extensions

severity_thresholds.high: All concrete examples with no theoretical framework, patterns, or abstract extension
severity_thresholds.medium: Some abstraction but stays close to examples; no independent theoretical work
severity_thresholds.low: Abstraction available but teacher-led only; students not generating abstractions

ceiling.rule: Flag tasks with capped expectations that prevent unlimited exploration or mastery

severity_thresholds.high: Fixed task ('complete these 10 problems') with no option for deeper/broader work
severity_thresholds.medium: Extensions available but feel like busywork ('do 5 more of the same'); horizontal not vertical
severity_thresholds.low: Ceiling exists but reasonable extension paths available for interested students

meaningful.rule: Flag repetitive practice or busywork without substantive new intellectual work

severity_thresholds.high: Practice identical to what was demonstrated (drill and kill); pure repetition for mastery students
severity_thresholds.medium: Some variation in practice but fundamentally same work; not building new understanding
severity_thresholds.low: Work is meaningful overall but could be more substantive for gifted (e.g., fewer problems with more complexity)
